name: Ten Second Tournament
description:
Mash the button as fast as you can to defeat your opponent. The faster you press it, the more damage you do. Win more rounds than your opponent to win the match. You can also play against the computer, who's pretty challenging. You can also play with 2 players, which is also really fun. It's a fun little fighting game that relies on speed. Please give it a try and tell me what you think. Thanks!

Controls:
WSAD, Arrow Keys, "SPACE"-menu Controls
"A" -p1Controls
"L" -p2Controls

*********************

Thanks for playing!

**UPDATE**
Now 2p mode has more characters and a character selection screen. It's also a little bit easier, due to complaints.**

Made for the LD27, using Unity.

Donations always accepted. Thank You!
